name: Let There Be Light (Pagi)
description:
Welcome! This is an orbital mechanics simulator game.

Planets? Yes.

Stars? Yes.

Black holes? Yes.

Wonky physics? Hell yeah.

Play as a god building a universe. Your goal is to let humans colonize as many planets as possible. You fight against gravity. Infinite carefully crafted (lol) levels await you.

CONTROLS:

Click to place an object. Press space to continue/retry. Press escape to open a menu.

Feeling bored? Enable cheats in menu and place as many objects as you like!
